item.title: Settling in with Standing Qigong
item.description:

item.title: Is Your Practice All in Your Head?
item.description: As you're sitting here reading this, I want you to try something. I want you to push yourself back away from your desk, let your arms hang by your sides, close your eyes and see how many fingers you can feel. Go ahead, try it. Now do the same thing again, but stand up and count your toes instead. Could you feel more fingers or toes? Chances are you have much greater feeling access to your fingers.
